msbt.message: Hey, you got a minute? Wanna go on a treasure hunt with me? To hunt for treasure?
Sure!
Maybe later.
You bored? I looked at ALL of the pictures in BOTH of my books, TWICE. So I'm pretty bored.Ya wanna go on a treasure hunt with me?
I'm in!
I can't right now.
I just had a great idea! Wanna go hunt for some treasure with me?
Sounds good!
Maybe not right now.
Cool! I'm gonna go bury some treasure somewhere on this island, so hold tight!
Cool! Hang out here for a second, and I'll go bury my treasure!
Yay! I'm gonna go bury a treasure box somewhere on the island!
Oh! Maaaan, it's already dark!<10_4 /> I guess it's too dark to be burying things now. Also, it's way past my snack time. No worries. We'll hunt for treasure some other time, !
OK! Some other time, maybe, !
That's fine! I'll ask again sometime when you're not busy, !
No worries. I'm gonna go talk to some bugs now, !

OK, so, the rules are real simple!<10_7 arg="120" />If you can find the treasure I buried before time runs out, thenyou win!<10_7 arg="120" />The treasure's buried in dirt, so don't go indoors! Folks get mad when you try to dig in their floors.<10_7 arg="120" />OK! Ready to hunt?<10_7 arg="240" />

The rules are real simple. I know, 'cause I made 'em.<10_7 arg="60" />You gotta find the treasure I buried before time's up. If ya can do that, then ya win!<10_7 arg="90" />The treasure's buried in dirt, and not indoors. Most folks don't keep dirt indoors.<10_7 arg="90" />Most folks don't like good ideas.<10_7 arg="90" />Also! This is you and me's serious treasure game, so other folks can't help. They can only watch!<10_7 arg="90" />Ready. Set? Gooooooooooo!<10_7 arg="120" />

The rules are real easy!<10_7 arg="60" />If you find the treasure I buried before the clock runs out, you win!<10_7 arg="90" /> The treasure is buried in the dirt, so no need to look indoors!<10_7 arg="90" />Nobody'd let me bury it in their house. And I asked EVERYONE!<10_7 arg="90" />Ya don't have as long to search this time, so good luck! Alright, ready?<10_7 arg="90" />

The rules, man, they're so simple!<10_7 arg="60" />If you find the treaure I buried before the clock runs out, you win! That's it! That's all the rules!<10_7 arg="90" />Oh. And the rule that the treasure is buried in dirt, so don't look in buildings.<10_7 arg="90" />Also! The rule that this is our game, so there's no one around to help! You're on your own!<10_7 arg="90" />There ain't as much time to search this go, OK? So be quick, and good luck! Alright, here we goooo!<10_7 arg="120" />
Ummm, do you already know the treasure-hunting rules?
Nope, tell me!
Yup.
A huh huh, well, good luck! Alright, get ready!<10_7 arg="60" />
A huh huh, good luck! Oh yeah, and you're the only person who can dig up the treasure!<10_7 arg="90" />Alright, get ready, !<10_7 arg="90" />
You don't have as much time to search, so it might be hard! Ready? Good luck!<10_7 arg="60" />

You don't have as much time to search, so it might be hard!<10_7 arg="90" />Oh yeah, and you're the only person who can dig up the treasure! Anyone else has to just watch, OK?<10_7 arg="90" /> OK, good luck, !<10_7 arg="90" />
Oh, it's ! I'm real glad to run into you! I've been sooo bored!Are you, like, free right now? We oughta play a game! Ya wanna do a treasure hunt?
Sure!
Sorry, not now.
I was just trying to decide what to play nextHey, ? You wanna play a treasure-hunting game?
Sounds fun!
I'm good.
Hang on! It's already dark! We can't play if you can't see. We'll have to try some other time, !
Cool! I was hoping you'd say yes! OK, hold on a second.I'm gonna go bury my favorite treasure somewhere on the island!<10_4 /> Stay here And no peeking!
OK, no worries! Some other time, !
Oh man! It's kinda dark now, huh? Guess you can't really see out here. We'll try it during the day sometime.
YAY! I'm gonna bury the treasure somewhere on the island.
OK! We'll play some other time!
I looked all over the island, but I couldn't find anywhere cool to bury the treasure!Welp, if ya can't bury treasure, ya can't have a treasure hunt!
